Package framework.components.api

Interface InputField<T>

Type Parameters:
T - - The type of value store by this field
All Superinterfaces:
Renderable
All Known Implementing Classes:
JSCheckBox, JSDateInput, JSInput, JSNumberInput, JSRadio, JSSelect, JSTextArea, JSTextInput, JSTimeInput
public interface InputField<T>
extends Renderable
All components which allows a user to input a value implements this interface.
This interface defines methods that allows setting and retrieving values
Author:
Kureem Rossaye

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String getBinding()
    This returns a key to which the value can be bound.
    T getValue()
    Returns the value entered
    InputField<T> setBinding​(java.lang.String binding)
    Sets the binding key to which the value can be bound
    InputField<T> setRequired​(boolean b)
    Makes the field required or not
    void setValue​(T val)
    Sets the value to the component
    void validate()
    Validates the value entered
